name: UX Research Plan with "Auto layout"
description:
This UX Research Plan was designed to help you organize and speed up your researches.


You can adapt this UX plan to any type of reseacrh or test, building at your own necessity.


Build alone or with you team. All instructions with examples are included to help you, even without knowledge in "Auto layout".


In this file you can:

  • Change logo
  • Change the color of card
  • Change text styles
  • Remove blocks
  • Build customized blocks (adapt for your necessity)
  • Add new block (change the quantity of blocks as you need)
  • Export to PDF (default) or select your format.


Available in English and Portuguese Brazil language
